mapper.select: select p.id, p.name from privilege p where p.id = #{parm1}
select p.id, p.name from privilege p order by p.name
select p.id id, p.name name from privilege p join role_priv rp on p.id = rp.priv_id join role r on r.id = rp.role_id where r.id = #{parm1} order by 2
mapper.update: update role set name=#{name} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into role( name ) values( #{name} ) on duplicate key update name = #{name}
